feed.title: Category: Chaos Rings | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Chaos Rings (iOS, 2010)
entry.content: A while ago, Chaos Rings went on sale to promote the prequel that was released. I bought it, stupidly thinking that the reason I hate playing games on my iPhone is that they are unfamiliar genres. It turns out I just hate playing any game on my iPhone. I played enough of this game to see what it would be like, but I doubt I'll play it again unless I'm totally desperate. I'd rather just read something on my phone. I don't blame this game though, I think it's really the fault of the phone.
